Flow.description: Allows the user to select multiple routes to update a contact and their related subscriptions or role, if applicable.

formulas.name: f_Job_Role_Number_and_Title
formulas.expression: IF({!Get_Job_Role.Id}="", ("No Associated Job Role, contact title is: " + {!Get_Triggering_Contact.Title}), ({!Get_Job_Role.Name} + " - " + {!Get_Job_Role.Job_Role_Title__c}))

Flow.label: Contact - SF - Subscriber Update

fields.name: Screen_Description_Contact_Merge
fields.fieldText: Please provide a link to the contact to be merged with the current contact:

validationRule.errorMessage: Inactive Contacts cannot be subscribed to Newsletters.

fields.name: Oops_Fill_Cancellation_Reason
fields.fieldText: Oops! Please select a Magazine Cancellation Reason.

fields.fieldText:
Success! The Contact has been set to Inactive

fields.fieldText:

fields.fieldText:
Didn't need an edit after all? No Problem!

View Contact

textTemplates.name: text_Template_Contact_Merge_with_Contacts
textTemplates.text: Please merge the following contacts: {!Get_Triggering_Contact.FirstName} {!Get_Triggering_Contact.LastName} [https://erepublic.lightning.force.com/lightning/r/Contact/{!recordId}/view], and {!Screen_Contact_to_Merge.recordName} [https://erepublic.lightning.force.com/lightning/r/Contact/{!Screen_Contact_to_Merge.recordId}/view]

textTemplates.name: text_Template_Contact_Merge_with_Contacts_Update_Email
textTemplates.text: Please merge the following contacts: {!Get_Triggering_Contact.FirstName} {!Get_Triggering_Contact.LastName} [https://erepublic.lightning.force.com/lightning/r/Contact/{!recordId}/view], and {!Get_Contact_from_Provided_Email_Address.Name} [https://erepublic.lightning.force.com/lightning/r/Contact/{!Get_Contact_from_Provided_Email_Address.Id}/view]

textTemplates.name: text_Template_Remove_Hard_Bounce_Description
textTemplates.text:
Remove Hard Bounce Status for Contact: {!Get_Triggering_Contact.FirstName} {!Get_Triggering_Contact.LastName} [https://erepublic.lightning.force.com/lightning/r/Contact/{!recordId}/view]
